yours_jeeva wrote:

> Mike,
> It works now. Works with fork on.
> Works even if i remove the excluded.propoerties!
> Does that make sense?
>

Yes - it does make sense.  Here's why...

Without forking a new JVM, the test runs in the same environment as the Ant executable
itself.  And, if you use the Ant task example I posted, then the reloading classloader
isn't employed.

Mike
